name: Let Him Rest
description:
A Project we worked on during GGJ17, we were playing with Pixel art and 2D AI for Game Jame. while we never fully realised it's potential we learned a lot from working on it.

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • E to possess objects
  • F To Kill/Scare people

Aim :

Prevent the People from exploring your home and fight of the final wave of "Busters". Posses Blue objects and use them to scare away intruders and possess the red objects to kill, but be warned that will only make the situation much worse.
